description: An object serving as model on what we send to our message queue

fields.name: className
fields.title: Class name
fields.description: The class name the events concerns

fields.name: recordId
fields.title: Record ID
fields.description: The ID of the affected record

fields.name: event
fields.title: Event
fields.description: The event that happened (create, update, delete)

fields.name: publicUrl
fields.title: Public URL
fields.description: An optional URL from which the affected resource can be fetched.
